Standing on a small island on a lonely outcropping in the midst of the grow=
ing archipelago that would one day be called Hawaii A dark figure stood. As=
h and smoke billowed around him as the ground rumbled dangerously. 

"Marau=
der, Report!" came an imperious voice over his internal coms. 

"Yes, I am =
here commander." came the reply, Marauder's voice deep and yet  eloquent. E=
ven as he spoke it was if the still figured was returning to life. Winglike=
 protrusions that attached to his back ruffled slightly as his formed strai=
ghtened and went from menacing to more majestic for a moment. "What are you=
r orders Lord Vorpral?" he continued, his voice almost aristocratic for a m=
oment. 

"You are to assume command of the minion, and you are to report to=
 leader Unicron, and he will give you orders." Came General Vorpral's voice=
 over the channel. "You are ready for our conquest!"

With a simple nod Mar=
auder leaped into the air, his form shifting and contorting until he assume=
d a rather fearsome looking starfighter! 

With a burst of power that rival=
ed the heat and fury of the volcanic eruptions around Marauder ripped into =
the skies above, a flaring fire into an already red sky. 

"My Lord!" Marau=
der opened a channel to the world destroyer known as Unicron as he continue=
d his skyward lift. "I await your command. The time has come!"

ron>
